name: Capricciosa
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, ham, eggs, artichoke, cocktail sausages, green olives

name: Quattro Stagioni
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, black olives, mushrooms, artichoke, peas, salami, eggs

name: Vegetariana
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, onion, (artichoke), sweet corn, green peppers

name: Quattro Formaggi
description: tomato sauce, and 4 assorted cheeses, generally mozzarella, Parmesan cheese, blue cheese, and goat cheese, but may vary

name: Marinara
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, shrimps, mussels, tuna, calamari, crab meat

name: Maltija (Maltese)
description: tomato sauce, goat cheese, sun dried tomatoes, Maltese sausage, onion

name: Calzone (folded)
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, ham, eggs

name: Rucola
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella di bufala, parma ham, Parmesan shavings, rucola

name: Bolognese
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, minced meat, onion, (fresh tomato)

name: Meat Feast
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, minced meat, Maltese sausage, and other meat

name: Kebabpizza
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, döner kebab, onion, green peperoncini, (kebab sauce poured over after baking)

name: Mexicana
description: tomato sauce, mozzarella, various recipes with minced beef, jalapeños, sweet corn, onion, spicy sauce and other hot description
